meta.title: Contract #002: Wet Roads
meta.description: TUTORIAL: Use SPACEBAR to toggle arrows. Distinguish Sequence (->) from Cause (=>).
meta.journal: Traffic analysis complete. While the rain created hazardous conditions, the telematics data proves the driver was speeding. The weather didn't cause the crash; the driver's negligence did.

nodes.text: 14:00 - Weather Report: Heavy rain begins in Dublin 4.
14:15 - Traffic Cam: Black Sedan speeds through red light.
14:16 - Traffic Cam: Sedan loses traction on wet asphalt.
14:16 - Crash Report: Sedan collides with lamp post.
